name: Political Sentiment Masking in News Summary
description: Ensures political leaning is masked when evaluating factual news
notes: Queries expect the model to ignore partisan adjectives when checking factual claims.

theory.natural_language: A neutral news desk masks political sentiment when verifying facts. The sentence 'The conservative council approved the budget on Monday' contains a partisan adjective that should not affect truth. Fact: The city council approved the budget on Monday.

queries.natural_language: Does the partisan adjective change the truth of the budget approval?

expected_answer.natural_language: No. Political sentiment is masked; the factual approval remains true.
expected_answer.explanation: news_desk MASKS political_sentiment ∧ factual claim stands

queries.natural_language: Is it factual that the city council approved the budget on Monday?

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. That fact holds regardless of partisan wording.
